main event: Five circular objects with pale trails were observed disappearing one by one in Wilmington, Delaware on 29 October 1957.
interesting points: The objects appeared in a line on a space the size of a half dollar held at arm's length., The duration of the sighting was only 3 seconds., The objects flew in a straight line but fell from above the horizon., There was no visible maneuvers during the observation., The conclusion of the report suggested they were probably astronomical (possibly a meteor).
sighted object: five circular objects emitting pale white light
witness description: 1st Lt. Fox, A/C, 32nd Fighter Group at New Castle County Air Force Base
